title: Summer Forecast: Cloudy With Occasional Storms
itunes:title: Summer Forecast: Cloudy With Occasional Storms
description:
After Boris Johnson scraped through a leadership challenge, will the worsening economic outlook be the next storm the Prime Minister faces? Bloomberg's Senior Executive Editor for EMEA David Merritt and Bloomberg Opinion Columnist Marcus Ashworth discuss the outlook for the challenging months ahead. Plus, Caroline Hepker and Stephen Carroll speak to the journalist Mary Ann Sieghart about her book 'The Authority Gap', and the hurdles female leaders she interviewed have experienced in their careers. 

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
